name: al-advanced-tools-suite
displayName: Advanced Tools Suite for AL Language
description: Advanced Tools Suite for AL Language

commands.title: ATS: Run Business Central without publishing
ATS: Set object namespace based on file path

configuration.title: Advanced Tools Suite for AL Language (ATS)

ATS.DefaultLaunchArchiveFolder.description: Default archive folder for import/export utiltities of launch.json file

ATS.UseObjectFilePathAsNamespace.description: Allow usage of object file path for namespace declarations (default = false)

ATS.RootNamespace.description: Namespace prefix to use for diagnositc rules and suggestions (if specified overrides the use of the al.rootNamespace setting)

ATS.DefaultNamespaces.description: List of default namespaces that can be used for AL objects

ATS.MaxNamespaceSize.description: No. of max elements expected for namespace declaration in AL objects (default = 5)

ATS.EnableNamespaceDiagnostics.description: Enable or disable warnings for wrong or missing namespace declarations in AL objects (default = false)

ATS.NamespaceMandatory.description: Enable or disable errors for missing namespace declarations in AL objects (default = false)

ATS.URLForwardingRules.description: URL forwarding rules used by command `ATS: Run Business Central without publishing` to run Business Central Client with different URL instead of the URL defined into launch.json for each configuration (Public URL or http to https conversion).

ATS.ShowRegionsOnStatusBar.description: Enable the visibility of the regions path of the current line in the status bar

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
